name: The Endless Bridge
description:
Roll across the endless bridge!

The Endless Bridge is an endless-runner game!

Use the arrow-keys to move your purple ball character along the bridge dodging the evil White Cube Invaders.

The Longer you survive, the wilder it gets!

I will be extremely surprised if anyone manages to get a score of 150, Give it a try!

This is my very first game, i hope you like it!
